member.name: CAUUID
member.summary: Specifies a counted array of UUID or GUID types used to receive an array of CLSIDs for the property pages that the object wants to display.

member.name: CAUUID.cElems
member.summary: The size of the array pointed to by pElems.

member.name: CAUUID.pElems
member.summary: A pointer to an array of values, each of which specifies a CLSID of a particular property page. This array is allocated by the callee using and is freed by the caller using .
